CustomField.description: To be used if there is a problem in the Mobile app in retrieving the Service Report - Office can tick this box, then Operative will need to pull down on the Work Order screen on mobile app to get the updated checkbox value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To be used if there is a problem in the Mobile app in retrieving the Service Report - Office can tick this box, then Operative will need to pull down on the Work Order screen on mobile app to get the updated checkbox value.
CustomField.label: Service Report Required Override
